PRIVACY POLICY

I. INTRODUCTION

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how Digital New Era Ltd. ("we", "our", "us") collects, uses, and protects your personal data.

II. DATA CONTROLLER

Digital New Era Ltd., identified by BG207276590, is responsible for the personal data you provide to us and handles it according to applicable data protection laws.

III. DATA ACCESS AND SHARING

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes. Data may be shared with trusted third-party service providers only to enhance and support our services, such as operational or analytical functions.

IV. LEGAL BASIS FOR DATA PROCESSING

We process your personal data based on one of the following legal grounds: compliance with legal obligations, performance of a contract, or your explicit consent. We will inform you of the specific legal basis for data processing when applicable, including the consequences of not providing your data.

V. DATA STORAGE AND TRANSFER

Your personal data is stored within the European Economic Area (EEA). If data is transferred outside the EEA, we ensure it is protected by appropriate safeguards, such as Standard Contractual Clauses, in compliance with applicable laws.

VI. DATA RETENTION

We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected or as required by law. You have the option to manage and delete cookies through your browser settings, keeping in mind that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of certain site features.

VII. YOUR RIGHTS

You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also object to the processing of your data, request restrictions on its use, or ask for data portability. To exercise these rights, contact us at CONNECT@NEWERAWEBSITES.COM.

VIII. DATA BREACH NOTIFICATION

In the event of a data breach, we will promptly comply with all legal requirements to notify affected individuals and relevant authorities.

IX. POLICY CHANGES

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on this page, and significant changes will be communicated more prominently.

X. CONTACT INFORMATION

For any questions or further assistance, please get in touch with us at CONNECT@NEWERAWEBSITES.COM.
